materials.raw_text: Ac: 10 g, Ru: 10 g, Sn: 30 g (Total: 50 g)

sourcing.instructions: Ac: Chemical supply stores; Ru: Precious metal suppliers; Sn: Electronics component retailers.
steps: Ac: Chemical supply stores; Ru: Precious metal suppliers; Sn: Electronics component retailers.
1. Measure 10 g of Ac, 10 g of Ru, and 30 g of Sn using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 10 g of Ac, 10 g of Ru, and 30 g of Sn using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a crucible.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a crucible.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool to room temperature.

steps: 1. Use a diamond file to smooth the edges of the solid sample.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Use a diamond file to smooth the edges of the solid sample.
